                     <div class="line">Say you can swim; alas, 'tis but a while!</div>
                     <div class="line">Tread on the sand; why, there you quickly sink:</div>
                     <div class="line">Bestride the rock; the tide will wash you off,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or else you famish; that's a threefold death.</div>
                     <div class="line">This speak I, lords, to let you understand,</div>
                     <div class="line">If case some one of you would fly from us,</div>
                     <div class="line">That there's no hoped-for mercy with the brothers</div>
                     <div class="line">More than with ruthless waves, with sands and rocks.</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, courage then! what cannot be avoided</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twere childish weakness to lament or fear.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                     <div class="line">Methinks a woman of this valiant spirit</div>
                     <div class="line">Should, if a coward heard her speak these words,</div>
                     <div class="line">Infuse his breast with magnanimity</div>
                     <div class="line">And make him, naked, foil a man at arms.</div>
                     <div class="line">I speak not this as doubting any here</div>
                     <div class="line">For did I but suspect a fearful man</div>
                     <div class="line">He should have leave to go away betimes,</div>
                     <div class="line">Lest in our need he might infect another</div>
                     <div class="line">And make him of like spirit to himself.</div>
                     <div class="line">If any such be here--as God forbid!--</div>
                     <div class="line">Let him depart before we need his help.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OXFORD</div>
                     <div class="line">Women and children of so high a courage,</div>
                     <div class="line">And warriors faint! why, 'twere perpetual shame.</div>
                     <div class="line">O brave young prince! thy famous grandfather</div>
                     <div class="line">Doth live again in thee: long mayst thou live</div>
                     <div class="line">To bear his image and renew his glories!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SOMERSET</div>
                     <div class="line">And he that will not fight for such a hope.</div>
                     <div class="line">Go home to bed, and like the owl by day,</div>
                     <div class="line">If he arise, be mock'd and wonder'd at.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                     <div class="line">Thanks, gentle Somerset; sweet Oxford, thanks.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                     <div class="line">And take his thanks that yet hath nothing else.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter a Messenger</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                     <div class="line">Prepare you, lords, for Edward is at hand.</div>
                     <div class="line">Ready to fight; therefore be resolute.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OXFORD</div>
                     <div class="line">I thought no less: it is his policy</div>
                     <div class="line">To haste thus fast, to find us unprovided.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SOMERSET</div>
                     <div class="line">But he's deceived; we are in readiness.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                     <div class="line">This cheers my heart, to see your forwardness.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OXFORD</div>
                     <div class="line">Here pitch our battle; hence we will not budge.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Flourish and march. Enter KING EDWARD IV, GLOUCESTER,
CLARENCE, and soldiers</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">Brave followers, yonder stands the thorny wood,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which, by the heavens' assistance and your strength,</div>
                     <div class="line">Must by the roots be hewn up yet ere night.</div>
                     <div class="line">I need not add more fuel to your fire,</div>
                     <div class="line">For well I wot ye blaze to burn them out</div>
                     <div class="line">Give signal to the fight, and to it, lords!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                     <div class="line">Lords, knights, and gentlemen, what I should say</div>
                     <div class="line">My tears gainsay; for every word I speak,</div>
                     <div class="line">Ye see, I drink the water of mine eyes.</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore, no more but this: Henry, your sovereign,</div>
                     <div class="line">Is prisoner to the foe; his state usurp'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">His realm a slaughter-house, his subjects slain,</div>
                     <div class="line">His statutes cancell'd and his treasure spent;</div>
                     <div class="line">And yonder is the wolf that makes this spoil.</div>
                     <div class="line">You fight in justice: then, in God's name, lords,</div>
                     <div class="line">Be valiant and give signal to the fight.</div>
                     <p>Alarum. Retreat. Excursions. Exeunt</p>
                     <div class="line">3 KING HENRY VI</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.6">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>5. SCENE V.  Another part of the field.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Flourish. Enter KING EDWARD IV, GLOUCESTER, CLARENCE,
and soldiers; with QUEEN MARGARET, OXFORD, and
SOMERSET, prisoners</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">Now here a period of tumultuous broils.</div>
                     <div class="line">Away with Oxford to Hames Castle straight:</div>
                     <div class="line">For Somerset, off with his guilty head.</div>
                     <div class="line">Go, bear them hence; I will not hear them speak.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OXFORD</div>
                     <div class="line">For my part, I'll not trouble thee with words.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SOMERSET</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor I, but stoop with patience to my fortune.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt Oxford and Somerset, guarded</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                     <div class="line">So part we sadly in this troublous world,</div>
                     <div class="line">To meet with joy in sweet Jerusalem.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">Is proclamation made, that who finds Edward</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall have a high reward, and he his life?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">It is: and lo, where youthful Edward comes!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter soldiers, with PRINCE EDWARD</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">Bring forth the gallant, let us hear him speak.</div>
                     <div class="line">What! can so young a thorn begin to prick?</div>
                     <div class="line">Edward, what satisfaction canst thou make</div>
                     <div class="line">For bearing arms, for stirring up my subjects,</div>
                     <div class="line">And all the trouble thou hast turn'd me to?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                     <div class="line">Speak like a subject, proud ambitious York!</div>
                     <div class="line">Suppose that I am now my father's mouth;</div>
                     <div class="line">Resign thy chair, and where I stand kneel thou,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whilst I propose the selfsame words to thee,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which traitor, thou wouldst have me answer to.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                     <div class="line">Ah, that thy father had been so resolved!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">That you might still have worn the petticoat,</div>
                     <div class="line">And ne'er have stol'n the breech from Lancaster.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                     <div class="line">Let AEsop fable in a winter's night;</div>
                     <div class="line">His currish riddles sort not with this place.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">By heaven, brat, I'll plague ye for that word.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, thou wast born to be a plague to men.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">For God's sake, take away this captive scold.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, take away this scolding crookback rather.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">Peace, wilful boy, or I will charm your tongue.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLARENCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Untutor'd lad, thou art too malapert.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PRINCE EDWARD</div>
                     <div class="line">I know my duty; you are all undutiful:</div>
                     <div class="line">Lascivious Edward, and thou perjured George,</div>
                     <div class="line">And thou mis-shapen Dick, I tell ye all</div>
                     <div class="line">I am your better, traitors as ye are:</div>
                     <div class="line">And thou usurp'st my father's right and mine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">Take that, thou likeness of this railer here.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Stabs him</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Sprawl'st thou? take that, to end thy agony.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Stabs him</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLARENCE</div>
                     <div class="line">And there's for twitting me with perjury.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Stabs him</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                     <div class="line">O, kill me too!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, and shall.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Offers to kill her</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">Hold, Richard, hold; for we have done too much.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Why should she live, to fill the world with words?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">What, doth she swoon? use means for her recovery.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Clarence, excuse me to the king my brother;</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll hence to London on a serious matter:</div>
                     <div class="line">Ere ye come there, be sure to hear some news.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLARENCE</div>
                     <div class="line">What? what?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">The Tower, the Tower.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                     <div class="line">O Ned, sweet Ned! speak to thy mother, boy!</div>
                     <div class="line">Canst thou not speak? O traitors! murderers!</div>
                     <div class="line">They that stabb'd Caesar shed no blood at all,</div>
                     <div class="line">Did not offend, nor were not worthy blame,</div>
                     <div class="line">If this foul deed were by to equal it:</div>
                     <div class="line">He was a man; this, in respect, a child:</div>
                     <div class="line">And men ne'er spend their fury on a child.</div>
                     <div class="line">What's worse than murderer, that I may name it?</div>
                     <div class="line">No, no, my heart will burst, and if I speak:</div>
                     <div class="line">And I will speak, that so my heart may burst.</div>
                     <div class="line">Butchers and villains! bloody cannibals!</div>
                     <div class="line">How sweet a plant have you untimely cropp'd!</div>
                     <div class="line">You have no children, butchers! if you had,</div>
                     <div class="line">The thought of them would have stirr'd up remorse:</div>
                     <div class="line">But if you ever chance to have a child,</div>
                     <div class="line">Look in his youth to have him so cut off</div>
                     <div class="line">As, deathmen, you have rid this sweet young prince!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">Away with her; go, bear her hence perforce.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, never bear me hence, dispatch me here,</div>
                     <div class="line">Here sheathe thy sword, I'll pardon thee my death:</div>
                     <div class="line">What, wilt thou not? then, Clarence, do it thou.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLARENCE</div>
                     <div class="line">By heaven, I will not do thee so much ease.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                     <div class="line">Good Clarence, do; sweet Clarence, do thou do it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLARENCE</div>
                     <div class="line">Didst thou not hear me swear I would not do it?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, but thou usest to forswear thyself:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twas sin before, but now 'tis charity.</div>
                     <div class="line">What, wilt thou not? Where is that devil's butcher,</div>
                     <div class="line">Hard-favour'd Richard? Richard, where art thou?</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou art not here: murder is thy alms-deed;</div>
                     <div class="line">Petitioners for blood thou ne'er put'st back.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">Away, I say; I charge ye, bear her hence.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">QUEEN MARGARET</div>
                     <div class="line">So come to you and yours, as to this Prince!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit, led out forcibly</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">Where's Richard gone?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLARENCE</div>
                     <div class="line">To London, all in post; and, as I guess,</div>
                     <div class="line">To make a bloody supper in the Tower.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">He's sudden, if a thing comes in his head.</div>
                     <div class="line">Now march we hence: discharge the common sort</div>
                     <div class="line">With pay and thanks, and let's away to London</div>
                     <div class="line">And see our gentle queen how well she fares:</div>
                     <div class="line">By this, I hope, she hath a son for me.</div>
                     <p>Exeunt</p>
                     <div class="line">3 KING HENRY VI</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.7">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>6. SCENE VI.  London. The Tower.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter KING HENRY VI and GLOUCESTER, with the
Lieutenant, on the walls</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Good day, my lord. What, at your book so hard?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, my good lord:--my lord, I should say rather;</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis sin to flatter; 'good' was little better:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Good Gloucester' and 'good devil' were alike,</div>
                     <div class="line">And both preposterous; therefore, not 'good lord.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Sirrah, leave us to ourselves: we must confer.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit Lieutenant</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                     <div class="line">So flies the reckless shepherd from the wolf;</div>
                     <div class="line">So first the harmless sheep doth yield his fleece</div>
                     <div class="line">And next his throat unto the butcher's knife.</div>
                     <div class="line">What scene of death hath Roscius now to act?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Suspicion always haunts the guilty mind;</div>
                     <div class="line">The thief doth fear each bush an officer.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                     <div class="line">The bird that hath been limed in a bush,</div>
                     <div class="line">With trembling wings misdoubteth every bush;</div>
                     <div class="line">And I, the hapless male to one sweet bird,</div>
                     <div class="line">Have now the fatal object in my eye</div>
                     <div class="line">Where my poor young was limed, was caught and kill'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, what a peevish fool was that of Crete,</div>
                     <div class="line">That taught his son the office of a fowl!</div>
                     <div class="line">An yet, for all his wings, the fool was drown'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                     <div class="line">I, Daedalus; my poor boy, Icarus;</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy father, Minos, that denied our course;</div>
                     <div class="line">The sun that sear'd the wings of my sweet boy</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy brother Edward, and thyself the sea</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose envious gulf did swallow up his life.</div>
                     <div class="line">Ah, kill me with thy weapon, not with words!</div>
                     <div class="line">My breast can better brook thy dagger's point</div>
                     <div class="line">Than can my ears that tragic history.</div>
                     <div class="line">But wherefore dost thou come? is't for my life?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Think'st thou I am an executioner?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                     <div class="line">A persecutor, I am sure, thou art:</div>
                     <div class="line">If murdering innocents be executing,</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, then thou art an executioner.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy son I kill'd for his presumption.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                     <div class="line">Hadst thou been kill'd when first thou didst presume,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou hadst not lived to kill a son of mine.</div>
                     <div class="line">And thus I prophesy, that many a thousand,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which now mistrust no parcel of my fear,</div>
                     <div class="line">And many an old man's sigh and many a widow's,</div>
                     <div class="line">And many an orphan's water-standing eye--</div>
                     <div class="line">Men for their sons, wives for their husbands,</div>
                     <div class="line">And orphans for their parents timeless death--</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall rue the hour that ever thou wast born.</div>
                     <div class="line">The owl shriek'd at thy birth,--an evil sign;</div>
                     <div class="line">The night-crow cried, aboding luckless time;</div>
                     <div class="line">Dogs howl'd, and hideous tempest shook down trees;</div>
                     <div class="line">The raven rook'd her on the chimney's top,</div>
                     <div class="line">And chattering pies in dismal discords sung.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy mother felt more than a mother's pain,</div>
                     <div class="line">And, yet brought forth less than a mother's hope,</div>
                     <div class="line">To wit, an indigested and deformed lump,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not like the fruit of such a goodly tree.</div>
                     <div class="line">Teeth hadst thou in thy head when thou wast born,</div>
                     <div class="line">To signify thou camest to bite the world:</div>
                     <div class="line">And, if the rest be true which I have heard,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou camest--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll hear no more: die, prophet in thy speech:</div>
                     <p>Stabs him</p>
                     <div class="line">For this amongst the rest, was I ordain'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, and for much more slaughter after this.</div>
                     <div class="line">God forgive my sins, and pardon thee!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Dies</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">What, will the aspiring blood of Lancaster</div>
                     <div class="line">Sink in the ground? I thought it would have mounted.</div>
                     <div class="line">See how my sword weeps for the poor king's death!</div>
                     <div class="line">O, may such purple tears be alway shed</div>
                     <div class="line">From those that wish the downfall of our house!</div>
                     <div class="line">If any spark of life be yet remaining,</div>
                     <div class="line">Down, down to hell; and say I sent thee thither:</div>
                     <p>Stabs him again</p>
                     <div class="line">I, that have neither pity, love, nor fear.</div>
                     <div class="line">Indeed, 'tis true that Henry told me of;</div>
                     <div class="line">For I have often heard my mother say</div>
                     <div class="line">I came into the world with my legs forward:</div>
                     <div class="line">Had I not reason, think ye, to make haste,</div>
                     <div class="line">And seek their ruin that usurp'd our right?</div>
                     <div class="line">The midwife wonder'd and the women cried</div>
                     <div class="line">'O, Jesus bless us, he is born with teeth!'</div>
                     <div class="line">And so I was; which plainly signified</div>
                     <div class="line">That I should snarl and bite and play the dog.</div>
                     <div class="line">Then, since the heavens have shaped my body so,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let hell make crook'd my mind to answer it.</div>
                     <div class="line">I have no brother, I am like no brother;</div>
                     <div class="line">And this word 'love,' which graybeards call divine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Be resident in men like one another</div>
                     <div class="line">And not in me: I am myself alone.</div>
                     <div class="line">Clarence, beware; thou keep'st me from the light:</div>
                     <div class="line">But I will sort a pitchy day for thee;</div>
                     <div class="line">For I will buz abroad such prophecies</div>
                     <div class="line">That Edward shall be fearful of his life,</div>
                     <div class="line">And then, to purge his fear, I'll be thy death.</div>
                     <div class="line">King Henry and the prince his son are gone:</div>
                     <div class="line">Clarence, thy turn is next, and then the rest,</div>
                     <div class="line">Counting myself but bad till I be best.</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll throw thy body in another room</div>
                     <div class="line">And triumph, Henry, in thy day of doom.</div>
                     <p>Exit, with the body</p>
                     <div class="line">3 KING HENRY VI</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.8">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>7. SCENE VII.  London. The palace.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Flourish. Enter KING EDWARD IV, QUEEN ELIZABETH,
CLARENCE, GLOUCESTER, HASTINGS, a Nurse with the
young Prince, and Attendants</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">Once more we sit in England's royal throne,</div>
                     <div class="line">Re-purchased with the blood of enemies.</div>
                     <div class="line">What valiant foemen, like to autumn's corn,</div>
                     <div class="line">Have we mow'd down, in tops of all their pride!</div>
                     <div class="line">Three Dukes of Somerset, threefold renown'd</div>
                     <div class="line">For hardy and undoubted champions;</div>
                     <div class="line">Two Cliffords, as the father and the son,</div>
                     <div class="line">And two Northumberlands; two braver men</div>
                     <div class="line">Ne'er spurr'd their coursers at the trumpet's sound;</div>
                     <div class="line">With them, the two brave bears, Warwick and Montague,</div>
                     <div class="line">That in their chains fetter'd the kingly lion</div>
                     <div class="line">And made the forest tremble when they roar'd.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thus have we swept suspicion from our seat</div>
                     <div class="line">And made our footstool of security.</div>
                     <div class="line">Come hither, Bess, and let me kiss my boy.</div>
                     <div class="line">Young Ned, for thee, thine uncles and myself</div>
                     <div class="line">Have in our armours watch'd the winter's night,</div>
                     <div class="line">Went all afoot in summer's scalding heat,</div>
                     <div class="line">That thou mightst repossess the crown in peace;</div>
                     <div class="line">And of our labours thou shalt reap the gain.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  I'll blast his harvest, if your head were laid;</div>
                     <div class="line">For yet I am not look'd on in the world.</div>
                     <div class="line">This shoulder was ordain'd so thick to heave;</div>
                     <div class="line">And heave it shall some weight, or break my back:</div>
                     <div class="line">Work thou the way,--and thou shalt execute.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">Clarence and Gloucester, love my lovely queen;</div>
                     <div class="line">And kiss your princely nephew, brothers both.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLARENCE</div>
                     <div class="line">The duty that I owe unto your majesty</div>
                     <div class="line">I seal upon the lips of this sweet babe.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">QUEEN ELIZABETH</div>
                     <div class="line">Thanks, noble Clarence; worthy brother, thanks.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GLOUCESTER</div>
                     <div class="line">And, that I love the tree from whence thou sprang'st,</div>
                     <div class="line">Witness the loving kiss I give the fruit.</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  To say the truth, so Judas kiss'd his master,</div>
                     <div class="line">And cried 'all hail!' when as he meant all harm.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">Now am I seated as my soul delights,</div>
                     <div class="line">Having my country's peace and brothers' loves.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLARENCE</div>
                     <div class="line">What will your grace have done with Margaret?</div>
                     <div class="line">Reignier, her father, to the king of France</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath pawn'd the Sicils and Jerusalem,</div>
                     <div class="line">And hither have they sent it for her ransom.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KING EDWARD IV</div>
                     <div class="line">Away with her, and waft her hence to France.</div>
                     <div class="line">And now what rests but that we spend the time</div>
                     <div class="line">With stately triumphs, mirthful comic shows,</div>
                     <div class="line">Such as befits the pleasure of the court?</div>
                     <div class="line">Sound drums and trumpets! farewell sour annoy!</div>
                     <div class="line">For here, I hope, begins our lasting joy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
      </article>

         <div class="content">
            <article class="preface" id="R.1.2">
               <header class="preface-titlepage">
                  <h2>Dramatis Personae</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="content">
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">KING HENRY, the Sixth.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">EDWARD, PRINCE OF WALES, his son. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">KING LEWIS XI, King of France. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">DUKE OF SOMERSET</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">DUKE OF EXETER</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">EARL OF OXFORD</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">EARL OF NORTHUMBERLAND</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">EARL OF WESTMORELAND</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">LORD CLIFFORD</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">RICHARD PLANTAGENET, Duke of York. </span>
                  </p>
                  <table border="0" class="simplelist" summary="Simple list">
                     <tr>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">
                              <span class="personname">EDWARD, Earl of March, afterwards King Edward IV.</span>
                              <span class="personname">EDMUND, Earl of Rutland.</span>
                              <span class="personname">GEORGE, afterwards Duke of</span>
                              <span class="personname">Clarence. </span>
                              <span class="personname">RICHARD afterwards Duke of</span>
                              <span class="personname">Gloucester.</span>
                           </span>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">his sons.</span>
                        </td>
                     </tr>
                  </table>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">DUKE OF NORFOLK</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">MARQUESS OF MONTAGUE</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">EARL OF WARWICK</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">EARL OF PEMBROKE</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">LORD HASTINGS</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">LORD STAFFORD</span>
                  </p>
                  <table border="0" class="simplelist" summary="Simple list">
                     <tr>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">
                              <span class="personname">SIR JOHN MORTIMER</span>
                              <span class="personname">SIR HUGH MORTIMER</span>
                           </span>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">uncles to the Duke of York.</span>
                        </td>
                     </tr>
                  </table>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">HENRY, Earl of Richmond, a youth.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">LORD RIVERS, brother to Lady Grey. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">SIR WILLIAM STANLEY</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">SIR JOHN MONTGOMERY</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">SIR JOHN SOMERVILLE</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Tutor to Rutland. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Mayor of York. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Lieutenant of the Tower. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">A Nobleman. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Two Keepers.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">A Huntsman. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">A Son that has killed his father. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">A Father that has killed his son. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">QUEEN MARGARET</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">LADY GREY, afterwards Queen to Edward IV. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">BONA, sister to the French Queen.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Soldiers, Attendants, Messengers, Watchmen, &c.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>SCENE  England and France.</p>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.3">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 1. ACT I</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.2">1. SCENE I.  London. The Parliament-house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.3">2. SCENE II.  Sandal Castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.4">3. SCENE III.  Field of battle betwixt Sandal Castle and Wakefield.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.5">4. SCENE IV.  Another part of the field.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  London. The Parliament-house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Alarum. Enter YORK, EDWARD, RICHARD, NORFOLK, MONTAGUE, WARWICK, and Soldiers</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">I wonder how the king escaped our hands.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">While we pursued the horsemen of the north,</div>
                              <div class="line">He slily stole away and left his men:</div>
                              <div class="line">Whereat the great Lord of Northumberland,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose warlike ears could never brook retreat,</div>
                              <div class="line">Cheer'd up the drooping army; and himself,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord Clifford and Lord Stafford, all abreast,</div>
                              <div class="line">Charged our main battle's front, and breaking in</div>
                              <div class="line">Were by the swords of common soldiers slain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord Stafford's father, Duke of Buckingham,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is either slain or wounded dangerously;</div>
                              <div class="line">I cleft his beaver with a downright blow:</div>
                              <div class="line">That this is true, father, behold his blood.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTAGUE</div>
                              <div class="line">And, brother, here's the Earl of Wiltshire's blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom I encounter'd as the battles join'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RICHARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak thou for me and tell them what I did.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Throwing down SOMERSET's head</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Richard hath best deserved of all my sons.</div>
                              <div class="line">But is your grace dead, my Lord of Somerset?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">Such hope have all the line of John of Gaunt!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RICHARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus do I hope to shake King Henry's head.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">And so do I. Victorious Prince of York,</div>
                              <div class="line">Before I see thee seated in that throne</div>
                              <div class="line">Which now the house of Lancaster usurps,</div>
                              <div class="line">I vow by heaven these eyes shall never close.</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the palace of the fearful king,</div>
                              <div class="line">And this the regal seat: possess it, York;</div>
                              <div class="line">For this is thine and not King Henry's heirs'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Assist me, then, sweet Warwick, and I will;</div>
                              <div class="line">For hither we have broken in by force.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORFOLK</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll all assist you; he that flies shall die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Thanks, gentle Norfolk: stay by me, my lords;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, soldiers, stay and lodge by me this night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They go up</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">And when the king comes, offer no violence,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless he seek to thrust you out perforce.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">The queen this day here holds her parliament,</div>
                              <div class="line">But little thinks we shall be of her council:</div>
                              <div class="line">By words or blows here let us win our right.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RICHARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Arm'd as we are, let's stay within this house.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">The bloody parliament shall this be call'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless Plantagenet, Duke of York, be king,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bashful Henry deposed, whose cowardice</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath made us by-words to our enemies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Then leave me not, my lords; be resolute;</div>
                              <div class="line">I mean to take possession of my right.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Neither the king, nor he that loves him best,</div>
                              <div class="line">The proudest he that holds up Lancaster,</div>
                              <div class="line">Dares stir a wing, if Warwick shake his bells.</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll plant Plantagenet, root him up who dares:</div>
                              <div class="line">Resolve thee, Richard; claim the English crown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Flourish. Enter KING HENRY VI, CLIFFORD,
NORTHUMBERLAND, WESTMORELAND, EXETER, and the rest</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">My lords, look where the sturdy rebel sits,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even in the chair of state: belike he means,</div>
                              <div class="line">Back'd by the power of Warwick, that false peer,</div>
                              <div class="line">To aspire unto the crown and reign as king.</div>
                              <div class="line">Earl of Northumberland, he slew thy father.</div>
                              <div class="line">And thine, Lord Clifford; and you both have vow'd revenge</div>
                              <div class="line">On him, his sons, his favourites and his friends.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                              <div class="line">If I be not, heavens be revenged on me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLIFFORD</div>
                              <div class="line">The hope thereof makes Clifford mourn in steel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WESTMORELAND</div>
                              <div class="line">What, shall we suffer this? let's pluck him down:</div>
                              <div class="line">My heart for anger burns; I cannot brook it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Be patient, gentle Earl of Westmoreland.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLIFFORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Patience is for poltroons, such as he:</div>
                              <div class="line">He durst not sit there, had your father lived.</div>
                              <div class="line">My gracious lord, here in the parliament</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us assail the family of York.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Well hast thou spoken, cousin: be it so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, know you not the city favours them,</div>
                              <div class="line">And they have troops of soldiers at their beck?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EXETER</div>
                              <div class="line">But when the duke is slain, they'll quickly fly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Far be the thought of this from Henry's heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make a shambles of the parliament-house!</div>
                              <div class="line">Cousin of Exeter, frowns, words and threats</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall be the war that Henry means to use.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou factious Duke of York, descend my throne,</div>
                              <div class="line">and kneel for grace and mercy at my feet;</div>
                              <div class="line">I am thy sovereign.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">I am thine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EXETER</div>
                              <div class="line">For shame, come down: he made thee Duke of York.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas my inheritance, as the earldom was.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EXETER</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy father was a traitor to the crown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Exeter, thou art a traitor to the crown</div>
                              <div class="line">In following this usurping Henry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLIFFORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom should he follow but his natural king?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">True, Clifford; and that's Richard Duke of York.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">And shall I stand, and thou sit in my throne?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">It must and shall be so: content thyself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Be Duke of Lancaster; let him be king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WESTMORELAND</div>
                              <div class="line">He is both king and Duke of Lancaster;</div>
                              <div class="line">And that the Lord of Westmoreland shall maintain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">And Warwick shall disprove it. You forget</div>
                              <div class="line">That we are those which chased you from the field</div>
                              <div class="line">And slew your fathers, and with colours spread</div>
                              <div class="line">March'd through the city to the palace gates.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NORTHUMBERLAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, Warwick, I remember it to my grief;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, by his soul, thou and thy house shall rue it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WESTMORELAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Plantagenet, of thee and these thy sons,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy kinsman and thy friends, I'll have more lives</div>
                              <div class="line">Than drops of blood were in my father's veins.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLIFFORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Urge it no more; lest that, instead of words,</div>
                              <div class="line">I send thee, Warwick, such a messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">As shall revenge his death before I stir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Poor Clifford! how I scorn his worthless threats!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you we show our title to the crown?</div>
                              <div class="line">If not, our swords shall plead it in the field.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">What title hast thou, traitor, to the crown?</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy father was, as thou art, Duke of York;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy grandfather, Roger Mortimer, Earl of March:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am the son of Henry the Fifth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who made the Dauphin and the French to stoop</div>
                              <div class="line">And seized upon their towns and provinces.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Talk not of France, sith thou hast lost it all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">The lord protector lost it, and not I:</div>
                              <div class="line">When I was crown'd I was but nine months old.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RICHARD</div>
                              <div class="line">You are old enough now, and yet, methinks, you lose.</div>
                              <div class="line">Father, tear the crown from the usurper's head.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EDWARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet father, do so; set it on your head.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTAGUE</div>
                              <div class="line">Good brother, as thou lovest and honourest arms,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's fight it out and not stand cavilling thus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RICHARD</div>
                              <div class="line">Sound drums and trumpets, and the king will fly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Sons, peace!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, thou! and give King Henry leave to speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Plantagenet shall speak first: hear him, lords;</div>
                              <div class="line">And be you silent and attentive too,</div>
                              <div class="line">For he that interrupts him shall not live.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Think'st thou that I will leave my kingly throne,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein my grandsire and my father sat?</div>
                              <div class="line">No: first shall war unpeople this my realm;</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and their colours, often borne in France,</div>
                              <div class="line">And now in England to our heart's great sorrow,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall be my winding-sheet. Why faint you, lords?</div>
                              <div class="line">My title's good, and better far than his.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Prove it, Henry, and thou shalt be king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Henry the Fourth by conquest got the crown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas by rebellion against his king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  I know not what to say; my title's weak.--</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me, may not a king adopt an heir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">What then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">An if he may, then am I lawful king;</div>
                              <div class="line">For Richard, in the view of many lords,</div>
                              <div class="line">Resign'd the crown to Henry the Fourth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose heir my father was, and I am his.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">He rose against him, being his sovereign,</div>
                              <div class="line">And made him to resign his crown perforce.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WARWICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Suppose, my lords, he did it unconstrain'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Think you 'twere prejudicial to his crown?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EXETER</div>
                              <div class="line">No; for he could not so resign his crown</div>
                              <div class="line">But that the next heir should succeed and reign.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING HENRY VI</div>
                              <div class="line">Art thou against us, Duke of Exeter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EXETER</div>
                              <div class="line">His is the right, and therefore pardon me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">YORK</div>
                              <div class="line">Why whisper you, my lords, and answer not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EXETER</div>
